inputs.selection_motivation: GBP/USD is tightly coupled to the USD Index (DXY) as a proxy for dollar strength; linking them captures the core currency correlation essential for cross‑asset analytics.
inputs.candidate_motivation: GBP/USD is driven by USD strength, US monetary policy, UK rates, and European monetary conditions; these topics directly influence or correlate with the GBP/USD exchange rate.

proposed_link.motivation: GBP/USD is tightly coupled to the USD Index (DXY) as a proxy for dollar strength; linking them captures the core currency correlation essential for cross‑asset analytics.
